Description: 7001 Arlington at Bethesda is a brand new luxury mid-rise apartment building that offers smart design and a sophisticated, forward-thinking atmosphere. Our community is located on the best block in Bethesda, walking distance from the Bethesda Metro stop and two blocks from shopping. Our luxury apartments are located approximately three miles south of the Capital Beltway (US 495) providing an easy commute to area employers. 7001 Arlington features 140 luxury apartments with gourmet kitchens, oversized private terraces, hardwood-style flooring, and quartz countertops. At 7001 Arlington we are committed to a greener lifestyle and we're 100% smoke free. Contact us today to schedule a tour of your new home.

Description: Find the perfect balance of open space and urban living at the Flats 8300. Located in Downtown Bethesda, this brand new apartment community embodies the look and feel of city living with the added charm of a scenic courtyard and lush green spaces bordering the community. Next door to NIH and Walter Reed Medical Center, Flats 8300 is just a quick trip from Bethesda?s renowned restaurants, exciting entertainment, and endless shopping. Drive to Rockville or hop on the metro to Washington, DC. Walk downstairs to the on-site Harris Teeter (open 24 hours) and Starbucks. At Flats 8300, you'll have easy access and open spaces right outside of your front door.

Description: From the moment the doorman greets you, entering our elegant lobby, it is clear that Topaz House provides residents with incomparable luxury, comfort and convenience. Choose from a variety of spacious floor plans with expansive closets, wall-to-wall carpeting and modern features designed for today's busy lifestyles. When it comes to unwinding, Topaz House offers residents a rooftop pool with a panoramic view of the area, 24/7 fitness center and an exquisitely appointed penthouse social room with wet bar and full kitchen. In the heart of Bethesda, Topaz House is just minutes away from the Bethesda Metro Station, and the shopping, dining, entertainment and services for which Bethesda is well known. Located between Connecticut and Wisconsin Avenues, on East-West Highway, Topaz House affords easy access from the indoor parking garage to downtown Washington, the Beltway, or I-270. Topaz House... Elegant living in Bethesda-Chevy Chase!

- Renovated kitchen with granite counter tops, laminated wood floors, roof top pool and gym
- Short steps to restaurants, grocery, etc.
- Short distance to NIH, Walter Reed and Suburban Hospital
- Walking distance from Bethesda Metro Station
- $1875 per month with 2 year lease, $1950 per month with 1 year lease

Pet Policy: Dogs Allowed

Description:
4 Bedrooms, 3 full Bathrooms
BRAND NEW GOURMET KITCHEN with gorgeous granite, stainless appl, tiled floor. Looking to rent my home right off Old Georgetown Road. I lived here with my family while working at NIH--its a quick 6 minute drive, and all back roads (avoid the highways during rush hour!). Its an updated spacious 4BR/3BA 2808+sqft rambler in Bethesda, with a fenced backyard, and driveway for easy parking.
Main level has beautiful hardwood floors, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, dining room, updated large kitchen with granite counters, sunroom and deck overlook a flat fenced back yard.
Lower level walks out to backyard, and contains 1 bedroom and bathroom with a large family room. It also contains a lot of storage! Unfurnished. 
Minutes to Montgomery Mall, Giant, NIH, 495 and Metro. 
Montgomery County Public School District: Ashburton Elementary School, North Bethesda Middle School and Walter Johnson High School

Description:
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION. This 4 Bedroom with a large full finished walkout basement Brick Colonia is less than five minutes pleasant walk to Bethesda Metro Center, within a couple of hundred yards of Crescent Trail and less than 50 Yards from Bethesda-Chevy Chase High School with plenty of parking space. 
living room and wood burning fireplace. Formal Dining room, Kitchen, a good size den off the kitchen. hardwood floors throughout. Gas oven/range, refrigerator, Door in kitchen leads out to a screen porch and a large fenced backyard. Three bedrooms and a full bath are all located on the top floor of the house. Full finished walkout basement with a full bath and a gas fireplace.
You are minutes from restaurants, nightlife and grocery stores Barns & Noble and etc.... 
Four young professionals who would like to share this house will love this location and excellent for a home office. 
The rent is $4,500.00 plus one-month security deposit. Please email me your phone number at rugweb@aol.com to be contacted. Eden.

Pet Policy: No Pets Allowed
Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description:
5301 Westbard Circle Bethesda, MD 20816 Apartment #443 
Don't miss this newly renovated (September 2017) bright and spacious condo located on the 4th floor at Kenwood Place Condominiums. This condo boasts brand-new granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, brushed nickel fixtures, tile flooring and newly installed carpeting (September 2017). The condo contains one full bath (completely renovated) with linen closet. 
Experience Bethesda living with a beautiful view, ample living space, spacious kitchen, walk-in closet and fantastic amenities, including an onsite fitness center and private pool. Included in the price of rent: water, electricity, parking spots, central heating/air, refrigerator, dishwasher, stove/oven, garbage disposal, front desk reception with package hold for tenants, private outdoor pool, fitness center. 
Cable/Internet/phone ready but is NOT included in rental price. 
AVAILABLE ASAP Please email or call (484) 686-7644 or (484) 431 5854 
Located one block from River Road, directly across from Westbard Shopping Center (Giant, Starbucks, Rite Aid, etc). Walking distance to MetroBus, Massachusetts Ave. and American university is 1.5 miles away. Beltway exit is about 4 miles away.

Description: Fantastic 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo at The Chase in Downtown Bethesda. Underground garage parking available! Bethesda Row & Metro just steps away. Gym, summer time outdoor pool and hot tub, tennis courts, business center, and 24 hour front desk. Ample storage available in a storage closet on the balcony. Washer and dryer in unit. Smart home: the thermostat, smoke detector and all of the light switches are internet enabled. Hardwood floor and carpet were renovated in 2015. Underground garage parking available for $125/month. Pets allowed on case-by-case basis.

Pet Policy: No Pets Allowed

Description:
Peaceful Park Oasis: newly UPDATED, sunny 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo in Bethesda. Walking distance (5 min) to Red Line metro, easy access to I-495/I-270, close to downtown Bethesda, Rockville, and Washington, D.C. Available starting October 1st, 2017. Utilities (water, gas, electric) included! 
Clean, updated TOP-FLOOR unit with double-paned thermal windows and plenty of natural sunlight overlooking Rock Creek Park provides peace and quiet. UPDATED bathroom and kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and modern cabinetry. Fresh, plush carpet throughout. Open living and dining room make it a perfect space for entertainment! Plenty of closet space with customizable built-ins. FREE off-street parking. 
Condo amenities include: outdoor pool, tennis courts, field, sitting gardens, playgrounds, off-street parking, and two community rooms for parties. Please be advised, Parkside is a pet-free community.
Apartment may come FURNISHED for an additional monthly fee. Furniture may be different than pictured. Please inquire about the specifics. Minimum 12 month lease. 1st month & security deposit (full month) due at signing. 
All interested, please contact for more information. Please be ready to share proof of income/stipend and references.

Description:
FULLY FURNISHED CONDO IN VERY CONVENIENT DOWNTOWN BETHESDA! Equipped with in-unit washer/dryer, spacious balcony w/ beautiful view, granite countertops, stainless appliances, kitchen cookware and utensils, iron and ironing board. Amenities include newly renovated gym, swimming pool and jacuzzi, pavilions with bbq grills, computer lab with unlimited printing. 
Walk 1-min to Bethesda Metro Station, 3 min to Bethesda row, 1 mile to NIH / Walter Reed Medical Center. Owners reside in Bethesda and are available to service the unit at tenant's notice.
Tenant responsible for own utilities; Lease duration is negotiable.

Description: Hardwood floors and 10 ft. ceilings adorn this spacious modern luxury condominium (942 sq. ft). Located on the top floor, this beautiful home has stainless steel appliances, newly renovated bathroom, washer/dryer, central a/c, remote control ceiling fan and ample closet space. Conveniently located near transportation, shopping, restaurants and entertainment, this luxury condominium community offers controlled-entry access, 24 hour concierge, community terrace, a newly renovated state-of-the-art fitness room, guest suite, social room, with library and bike room storage. Rent includes two reserved parking spaces in the controlled entry access garage, gas & water.

Description: Quiet, yet convenient, Bethesda Hill is a hidden gem in Bethesda, MD. These apartments feature both townhome style and single floor living. Residents enjoy the open atmosphere, outdoor pool with sundeck, convenient metro access and free parking. This beautiful garden style community is located right down the road from I-270 and I-495, making your commute a breeze.

Description:
In the heart of exciting Downtown Bethesda, The Fields puts you right in the middle of one of the DC area’s most sought-after communities. Surrounded by incredible shopping and overflowing with popular restaurants, Bethesda offers you everything you want close to home. ?Stroll to dozens of exceptional restaurants and stores
?Take in a blockbuster movie or art film at one of two nearby theaters
?Walk to the Bethesda Metro, just 8 to 12 minutes away
?Enjoy a live performance at the nearby Music Center of Strathmore
?Bike the Capital Crescent Trail
?Drive to downtown DC in just minutes
?Easily access I-495 and I-270 The Fields of Bethesda offers studio, one-bedroom with den, two-bedroom and three-bedroom apartment homes.

Description:
(240) 403-0400 - - Upscale renovations, freshly painted and cleaned. Can't beat the location. Close to Bethesda and Medical Center Metro. Free Bethesda bus service by the building. Next to park with tennis courts, playground and walking path to Woodmont Triangle with restaurants, clubs, shops and more. Utilities are included in the price. Parking for 2 cars with a permit.Great gym. Common Laundry room.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3608925) Other Amenities - Other- attached master bathroom, bathroom(s) - ceramic tile, bedroom - entry level, closet(s) - walk-in, countertop(s) - granite, shades / blinds, wood floors, Elevator in Building. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description: Spacious split with granite counters is ready for your most discerning client! 4 Brs/3 full baths large liv room with fireplace dining room den/office and family room are highlights of the 4 level floor plan. New kitchen with granite counters upscale appliances maple cabinets & ceramic floor. New bathrooms with tasteful tile throughout. Double-glazed heated sun room with expansive view of well-developed & lighted garden leading to flagstone patio.

Description: Spacious recently renovated 5 bedroom/4 full bath split level house with kitchen with breakfast bar stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Large living room with fireplace dining room with french door entrance to recently built deck and patio in spacious fenced in back yard. Property has hard wood floors finished basement with 2nd kitchen capability. Lead Free Certified.

Description: Freshly painted 4 levels w/a huge family room skylites tons of natural light Palladian windows vaulted ceiling. 3 baths 5 spacious bedrooms plus a basement for storage. Warm wood flooring is gorgeous and flows thoughout two upper levels.Large welcoming kitchen w granite counters and newer appliances. Less than 1 mile to NIH Metro Naval Medical Center and downtown Bethesda.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

Description: GORGEOUS 1 BR den w/ 2 full baths in heart of Bethesda! Gourmet kit w/ SS appliances granite counters & breakfast bar seating. Huge windows in LR & BR has unit brimming w/ natural light! MBR feat. WIC & full BA/ spacious vanity & stacked W/D. 1 garage space conveys. Secured bldg w/ fitness rm & terrace. Brand new Target across the st! Steps away from Metro shopping & dining. Good credit req.

Description: 5 bedrms 4.5 bath house with large kitchen with granite SS appliances double ovens 5 burner cooktop with island and butlers pantry. Family rm with gas fire place and stone patio off of kitchen. Living rm w/fp dining rm and study on mail level. 4 bedrooms and 3 full baths with laundry room on upper level. Lower level has 5th bedrm with full bath and recreation room with gas fp.& storage.

Description: Great 3 level end unit townhouse in Bethesda. This has 3 bedrooms 3.5 baths. Kitchen has new Stove Micro Wave and Refrig. Living room and Dining room has wooden floors and brand new carpets in all bedrooms. Fully finished lower level with den and storage room and full bath. Freshly painted. Close to everything in downtown Bethesda. Nice community just behind Safeway on Bradley and Arlington.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

Description: Freshly Painted! Beautiful 1BR Balcony unit with Southern Exposure. Bright Sunny - with washer and dryer in the unit. Granite and Stainless kitchen - hardwood floors and large windows. Just one block from Bethesda Row - and 3 from Bethesda Metro. Rent includes Heat A/C Gas and assigned underground parking. Average electric is 50. Best value in Bethesda! Available Immediately.

Finished lower level with theater room exercise room kitchen bedroom and bath. Elevator. Easy access to the beltway downtown Bethesda. Yard and snow removal included. Available immediately.

Description: Four levels dramatic cathedral ceiling in master family room off kitchen w/ wood burning fireplace. French doors leading to private Georgetown style brick patio. Upper loft with cedar closets perfect for guest bedroom playroom or office. Incredible storage rarely seen in town-home. 9 ft ceilings in lower level 2-car attached garage & private outdoor entrance to give flexibility

Description: Four bedroom colonial on a very nice block in the terrific neighborhood of Sumner! Very easy commute to downtown DC and a short drive to Bethesda or Friendship Heights. 4 blocks to the Crescent Trail (all downhill!) for jogging or biking into Georgetown. Whitman High School cluster. Very good condition. Sunny breakfast room addition plus a screened porch. Den with first floor powder rm. Excellent!

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Oven
* Refrigerator

Description: Updated Tudor colonial loaded w/ character in prestigious Kenwood! Recent granite & stainless kitchen and renovated baths! Sought after community locally famous for its cherry tree lined streets. Access to the popular Crescent Trail within the neighborhood - walk or bike to downtown Bethesda or all the way to Georgetown! Dark hardwood flooring adds to the elegance. Deck to enjoy private back yard.

Perfect for entertaining-home theatre w/ 8 leather reclining seats wet bar expansive deck patio. Designed for extended family/home office/in-law suite. Over 6000 sq ft. 2 car garage. Description:
(301) 237-4950 - High Tech 1 Bedroom w/ Tons of Amenities Close to Metro! - Welcome to your next home that features amazing morning sun, a stunning kitchen, balcony and is wired to cater to your every whim. Tell Nest that have the AC on before you walk in the door so it's already nice and cold. Don't bother flipping the light switch. Just tell Alexa to turn the lights on. 
Your building features a 24 hour front desk attendant, outdoor swimming pool, 2 tennis courts, gym with cardio and weights, a hot tub, 2 BBQ grills and library.
A reserved, garage parking space is available for $125/month.
Please email Scott Goldberg at Scott@StreamlineManagement.com to see this great place!

12 month minimum lease
Pets considered on a case by case basis
1 month's rent as security deposit
Resident responsible for water, electric and gas

Rarely available recently renovated end unit townhouse with 3 spacious bedrooms boasting the largest floor plan in the development. (301) 233-6501 - In the HEART of Bethesda - 4BD/2.5BA Fresh & Ready to Move-in! - 4BD/2.5BA Home in an awesome location just one block from Wisconsin Ave and minutes to METRO & Downtown Bethesda with endless shopping & restaurants. This 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath SF home has hardwood on main and upper levels, off street parking for 1-2 cars, screened in porch, super close to BCC/NIH and in the heart of Downtown Bethesda.
(RLNE3381178)

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - 4 Bed 3.5 Bath Townhouse in the Westlake Terrace Neighborhood of Bethesda - Enter this terrific townhouse off of a small porch into a formal foyer with coat closet and half bath. To the left of the foyer is an eat-in kitchen that comes equipped with an electric range, separate double wall ovens, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal along with lots of cabinet space. L-shaped living room/dining room (13x10)(17x15) is located at the back of the house and has hardwood floors. Stairs in foyer lead up to the second level. Master bedroom (17x15) includes hardwood floors, his/her closets and a full bath. Two additional bedrooms (13x12)(12x10) also have hardwood floors and share a hall bath. Finished basement includes a fourth bedroom (15x12) with hardwood floors, large family room (21x17) with hardwood floors and a wood burning fireplace, full bath and laundry room. Sliding glass doors in family room lead out onto a patio and the back yard that overlooks a lake. No Pets Please. To inquire, call or text WMS at 240-997-3585.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3383411) Other Amenities - Other- unassigned parking, community pool and tennis courts. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - Renovated 1 BED 1 BATH in Riviera Condominium / Blocks from Bethesda METRO. All Utes +1 garage spot included! - Enter this lovely apartment into a small foyer with coat closet. To the right of the foyer is a renovated kitchen that comes equipped with a gas range, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal along with granite counter tops and ample cabinet space. Spacious living room dining room combo (18x15) adjoins the updated kitchen. Hallway off living room leads to the bedroom (15x12). Renovated bath is located just outside of the bedroom. All utilities and a one assigned garage parking space is included in the rent. There is a $200 non-refundable building move in fee. No Pets. Please call WMS at 240 997 3585 to inquire!
(RLNE2252756) Other Amenities - Other- washer/dryer on each floor, rooftop patio, rooftop pool, Exercise Facility, Garage. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal.

Description:
(240) 620-8226 - River Quarry Townhouse Elegance - Luxury TH - 3875 Sq. Ft 4/4.5 - Exquisite finishes on this Luxury TH, 4 bedrooms, 4.5 Baths, 3 finished Levels, high ceilings, stone exterior, elevator and bedroom level laundry! Hardwood on main level, Granite & Stainless, Huge Rooms with loads of light, Huge Master Suite with Dual Walk-In Closets, two car garage, Custom Rear Patio. Located close in Bethesda with easy access to 495, 20 minutes to downtown DC, 14 minutes to Rockville or Tysons Corner!
(RLNE1939649) Other Amenities - Elevator in Building.

Description: LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! One of the prettiest streets in N. Bethesda. Updated, SFH, 3 BR/3 BA w/hardwood floors throughout. LR, DR, Kitchen with ss appliances, family room, Sun-drenched den-library with cathedral ceiling, skylights. LL can be used as 4th BR with private bath. Plenty of storage, fenced in backyard w/patio and serene setting. 1 car Garage. This one you won't want to miss.

Description:
(301) 233-6501 - LUXURY 5BD/4.5BA TH in Bethesda w/ELEVATOR - Gated Community - Award Winning Carter Custom Built Luxury TH in RIVER QUARRY - Spectacular, close to DC, VA, MD - 3 finished levels w/ Elevator (hardwired phone line required for use). Hardwood Floors, Gourmet Kitchen w/Granite, Breakfast Bar & ENERGY STAR APPLIANCES. 2 car garage + driveway. Fully finished basement w/full BR & BA. Large master en-suite. Bedroom level laundry. Rear deck & yard. Gated community.
(RLNE3325059)

Description: There’s a perfect home for you at The Seasons! Just steps outside your door you’ll find the latest fashions and legendary dinning. Each apartment home offers parquet wood flooring, spacious floor plans and fantastic views! Closet space is abundant! Gas, electric and water is paid for! Only 3 blocks from the Bethesda Metro station! Take advantage of our on-site Fitness Center and our 24-hour concierge service. Rated 100% Walkable by Walkscore.com, The Seasons is just steps from Bethesda Row, Capital Crescent Trail, Montgomery Farm Women’s Cooperative Market, Regal Cinemas, and much, much more! Just one mile from Washington, DC border, Bethesda is home to National Institute of Health, National Naval Medical Center, and Uniformed Services University of Health Sciences. Bethesda is also the home to the Walter Reed Army Medical Center. Enjoy apartment living at its finest.
